p: Essential oils antiproliferative activities against MCF-7, HeLa, Jurkat, HT-29,T24 and HEK-293 followed the MTT method [ 37] with modifications. Five doses of leaf extracts were used to reach a final concentration of 50, 100, 200, 300, and 400 μg/mL culture media. Negative controls and positive (vinblastine sulfate and taxol) were used.
